For ESI and crystallographic data in CIF or other electronic format see DOI: 10.1039/c3dt50432hcrystallographic data‡ Single crystal of compounds 1–2 were selected on a Bruker P4 diffractometer with graphite-monochromated MoKα radiation (λ = 0.71073 Å) at 293 K using the θ–2θ scan technique. The data were corrected for Lp and absorption effects. Their crystal structures were solved by direct methods with the SHELXS-97 program.14,15 Detailed information about the crystal data and structure determination for title complexes are summarized in Table 1. Their selected intra-atomic distances and bond angles are given in Table S1.

crystallographic data

‡ Single crystal of compounds 1-2 were selected on a Bruker P4 diffractometer with graphite-monochromated MoKα radiation (λ = 0.71073 Å) at 293 K using the θ-2θ scan technique. The data were corrected for Lp and absorption effects. Their crystal structures were solved by direct methods with the SHELXS-97 program.14,15 Detailed information about the crystal data and structure determination for title complexes are summarized in Table 1. Their selected intra-atomic distances and bond angles are given in Table S1.
